#BlackMagicCraft #Episode120

In this video I discuss an original puzzle room I created for my homebrew campaign of Dungeons & Dragons. I call this room the "Beacon of Plenty" and its designed to be a dynamic puzzle room that can also grant a lot of cool perks for player characters right before the face the big bad in a final showdown.
